New Records: Jaime Jaquez Jr. recorded his first career triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists
Key Match Events: The game went into double overtime
Jaime Jaquez Jr.'s missed free throws in the first overtime
Tyler Herro's costly 8-second violation late in the fourth quarter
DeMar DeRozan scored nine of Sacramento's 11 points in the second overtime
Post-Match Reflections: Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra said 'There will be a breakthrough... We're going to learn from these tough games'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Miami Heat suffered their third consecutive loss, dropping them to 17-17 on the season
Sacramento extended their winning streak to a season-high five games under interim coach Doug Christie
Others: Bam Adebayo's shooting struggles continued as he managed just 6-of-19 from the field
The Heat's inability to close out games has been a recurring theme
